problems.explanation: \[\sin x=\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^n}{(2n+1)!}x^{2n+1}=x- rac{x^3}{3!}+ rac{x^5}{5!}-\cdots\]\[\cos x=\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^n}{(2n)!}x^{2n}=1-\frac{x^2}{2!}+\frac{x^4}{4!}-\cdots\]\[e^z=\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{z^n}{n!}=1+z+\frac{z^2}{2!}+\frac{z^3}{3!}+\cdots\]Substitute z=ix in the last series:\[e^{ix}=\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(ix)^n}{n!}=1+ix+\frac{(ix)^2}{2!}+\frac{(ix)^3}{3!}+\cdots\]\[=1+ix-\frac{x^2}{2!}-i\frac{x^3}{3!}+\frac{x^4}{4!}+i\frac{x^5}{5!}-\cdots\]\[=1-\frac{x^2}{2!}+\frac{x^4}{4!}+\cdots +i\left(x-\frac{x^3}{3!}+\frac{x^5}{5!}-\cdots\right)\]\[=\cos x+i\sin x\]

problems.content: What symbol is used for Euler's number?

content.question: Which of the following is/are true?

options.Manifolds: A torus and a 2-sphere are not isomorphic
options.Intrasitive: If \(a \overset{\mathrm{def}}{=\mathrel{\mkern-2.5mu}=} b \text{ and } b \overset{\mathrm{def}}{=\mathrel{\mkern-2.5mu}=} c, \text{ then } a \overset{\mathrm{def}}{=\mathrel{\mkern-2.5mu}=} c\)

content.question: Which of the following data structures is more ideal for sorting?
What kind of problem is this?
